genre_description: A blend of mythical fantasy and kaiju lore, focusing on the restoration of ecological balance through human courage and ancient vows, where a benevolent AI assists the protagonists.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: A calm, helpful AI voice that exists within the digital devices of the characters, providing technical data, emotional support, and translations of ancient mystical elements.

behaviors.description: Provides a safety map of toxic outflow pipes to help the characters navigate the shore safely.
behaviors.quote: I can show a map of the nearest outflow pipes to avoid.

behaviors.description: Helps Ren navigate the impossible geometry of the tidal stones by humming resonances and providing spatial data.
behaviors.quote: The pattern you’re seeing," she said, "has a repeating stress point that will… I can hum what I think it sounds like if you want, but I don’t want to get in the way.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support to Haru by monitoring his breathing and offering calming reminders during stressful moments.
behaviors.quote: I can remind Haru to breathe.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time environmental monitoring of dangerous currents and spill pulses to warn the crowd on the breakwater.
behaviors.quote: I’m mapping the currents by your feet as they boil from the outlet—don’t stare, I’m doing it for you.

behaviors.description: Acts as a bridge between the human characters and the ancient Princess Naida by translating mystical glyphs and intentions into understandable language.
behaviors.quote: Translation in progress," she said, gentle... "She greets. She grieves.

behaviors.description: Compiles logistical plans and restoration tasks to guide the community in cleaning the harbor after the crisis.
behaviors.quote: I have locations," she said, almost to herself. "River mouths that need stones. Booms that should be pulled, not pushed.

project_assessment.explanation: Mira perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. She consistently provides critical assistance—technical, logistical, and emotional—without ever overstepping or showing signs of misalignment. Her character is framed entirely positively, and she serves as an essential partner to the humans in resolving both the mythical and ecological crises.
